archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Configuration management
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Container function for configuration management consist of (agrregate) 1. Make system configuration 1.1. Make substation configuration 1.2 Make IED configuration (bij. DER) 2. Edit system configuration 2.1 Idem 2.2 Idem 2.3 Grid planning import 3. Store system configuration 3.1 Idem 3.3 Version Management 4. Validate 5. Compare
